incident.description:
Alarm Name: RDS-prod-db-01-DBConnectionsHigh
Alarm Description: Triggered when DB connections exceed threshold
AWS Account: 123456789012
Alarm Region: us-east-1
New State: ALARM
Old State: OK
New State Reason: Threshold Crossed: 1 out of the last 1 datapoints [487.0 (23/10/25 14:32:00)] was greater than the threshold (450.0) (minimum 1 datapoint for OK -> ALARM transition).
Alarm ARN: arn:aws:cloudwatch:us-east-1:123456789012:alarm:RDS-prod-db-01-DBConnectionsHigh
Metric Namespace: AWS/RDS
Metric Name: DatabaseConnections
Dimension: {DBInstanceIdentifier=prod-db-01}
Period: 300 seconds
Evaluation Periods: 1
Datapoints to Alarm: 1
Threshold: 450.0
Comparison Operator: GreaterThanThreshold
Treat Missing Data: notBreaching
State Change Time: 2025-10-23T14:32:15.789+0000
